0.3.description:
Delays Automation execution for a specified amount of time. This action uses the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 8601 date and time format.

Automation currently supports a maximum delay of 604800 seconds (7 days).

Duration.description: An ISO 8601 duration. You can't specify a negative duration.

TimeStamp.description: An ISO 8601 timestamp. If you don't specify a value for this parameter, then you must specify a value for the Duration parameter.
